cause.description:
Tibet is under the tyranny of the Chinese communist government. Tibet's environment and ecosystem is being destroyed by the Chinese government, including the destruction of forest land to make way for roads used by the military, nuclear pollution, and poaching of Tibetan wildlife.
1. China must give over power to the Governemnt-in-exile
cause.mission: Help gain independence for Tibet over The Peoples Republic Of China
cause.name: Tibetan Freedom
